markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energy Blessed](/Feats.aspx?ID=972) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 21 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Elemental Heart Dwarf](/Heritages.aspx?ID=32) heritage

</column>

---

Energy runs through your blood more powerfully. When you use [Energy Emanation](/Actions.aspx?ID=315), you can create an emanation of 5 feet, 10 feet, or 15 feet. The damage increases to 6d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every level you have above 9th, instead of 1d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every 2 levels above 1st.
name: Energy Blessed

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Energy Blessed Source Character Guide pg. 21 2.0 Prerequisites Elemental Heart Dwarf heritage --- Energy runs through your blood more powerfully. When you use Energy Emanation, you can create an emanation of 5 feet, 10 feet, or 15 feet. The damage increases to 6d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every level you have above 9th, instead of 1d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every 2 levels above 1st.
